Name: Trick and Treat - Visual Novel
About the game: Type: Visual Novel Language: English translation Genre: Thriller, Mystery and a little romance Duration: about 3 hours Synopsis: A forest is the setting for this story, where our protagonist decides to explore with his friends to corroborate the existent legend, suddenly something attacks leaving our protagonist at the mercy of the unknown. In this adventure will meet two girls, Ashley and Lilian, which he will not to know what are their intentions and hidden secrets.
